title: Norbert Düwel
text:
Norbert Düwel (born 5 January 1968) is a German <a href="Association%20football">football</a> manager who last managed <a href="1.%20FC%20Union%20Berlin">1. FC Union Berlin</a>.
Coaching career.
In May 2014 it was announced that Düwel would replace <a href="Uwe%20Neuhaus">Uwe Neuhaus</a> as manager of <a href="1.%20FC%20Union%20Berlin">Union Berlin</a>. He was subsequently sacked on 31 August 2015. Union Berlin picked up four points from five matches to start the <a href="2015%E2%80%9316%201.%20FC%20Union%20Berlin%20season">2015–16 season</a>. He finished with a record of 12 wins, 15 draws, and 14 losses.
